title: Bug 6124[DND] Dialog opened on drop is hidden
description: Bug 6124[DND] Dialog opened on drop is hidden Build 20011116.
OB: Do it again to the same destination folder, with Eclipse partially obscuredbehind Windows Explorer. It opens a dialog prompting whether to overwrite the existing file, but thedialog is not visible.Eclipse should be brought to front.
SR: Drag a file from Windows Explorer to the Navigator or Packages view. Do it again to the same destination folder, with Eclipse partially obscuredbehind Windows Explorer.
